name: InsectaraX
description:
Planet Insectarax is being invaded by the evil Horde!

You are piloting a prototype ship equipped with top of the line tech to face this evil that threatens the peace on your home world.

Can you defeat the invaders and bring peace to your world? 

The fate of the planet is in your hands!  

.Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys for movement, E to use bomb, space bar to shoot, Escape key for pause, also compatible with a gaming controller

.Art & Sounds: Gendgi

.Code: Signalised

. Gamepad supported :
